response.original_title: Taming the Mafia Boss, He's Mine Now!
response.overview: Leah, the daughter of the Cruz family, appears to be a "fierce delicate flower" who throws money around in nightclubs and acts in a cynical way on the surface. In reality, she is a down-and-out heir whose power was seized by her stepfather. During a misunderstanding, Leah, fueled by alcohol, generously spent a large sum of money and "kept" Allen, the "bankrupt noble young master"
response.tagline: Female, Sweet, Mafia, Hidden Identity, Love at First Sight, Contract Lovers, Billionaire, Heiress/Socialite,
response.title: Taming the Mafia Boss, He's Mine Now!
